mapper.select: select id, code, username, nick_name, password, last_password_reset_date, user_type, mobile, email, sex, state, deleted, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sys_user where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user(code, username, nick_name, password, last_password_reset_date, user_type, mobile, email, sex, state, deleted, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{code}, #{username}, #{nickName}, #{password}, #{lastPasswordResetDate}, #{userType}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{sex}, #{state}, #{deleted}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})

insert into sys_user(code, username, nick_name, password, last_password_reset_date, user_type, mobile, email, sex, state, deleted, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.code}, #{entity.username}, #{entity.nickName}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.lastPasswordResetDate}, #{entity.userType}, #{entity.mobile}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.state}, #{entity.deleted}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into sys_user(code, username, nick_name, password, last_password_reset_date, user_type, mobile, email, sex, state, deleted, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.code}, #{entity.username}, #{entity.nickName}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.lastPasswordResetDate}, #{entity.userType}, #{entity.mobile}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.state}, #{entity.deleted}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update code = values(code), username = values(username), nick_name = values(nick_name), password = values(password), last_password_reset_date = values(last_password_reset_date), user_type = values(user_type), mobile = values(mobile), email = values(email), sex = values(sex), state = values(state), deleted = values(deleted), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update sys_user
code = #{code},
username = #{username},
nick_name = #{nickName},
password = #{password},
last_password_reset_date = #{lastPasswordResetDate},
user_type = #{userType},
mobile = #{mobile},
email = #{email},
sex = #{sex},
state = #{state},
deleted = #{deleted},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
